p: The primary outcome will be the form of faces every day. The BSFS (Bristol Stool Form Scale) [ 15] will be used to assess patients' face form before, during and after the intervention. A higher BSF score indicates soft feces: 1 to 2 points indicate constipation, 3 to 4 points indicate normal feces, and 5 to 7 points indicate diarrhea.
